job description:
Operating duty

  1. responsible for understanding and analyzing image and video content, feature description and extraction of image and video data.
  2. responsible for image recognition and classification, machine learning, deep learning and other related algorithms development and implementation.
  3. responsible for image classification, target detection, face recognition and other technologies.

Post requirements

  1. master degree or above in computer science or related field; more than 5 years of research or development experience in image processing.
  2. Good programming ability and code style, familiar with C/C++, Python development; Unix/Linux environment development experience
  3. deep understanding of deep learning technology, at least proficient in a deep learning framework.
  4. Has more in-depth experience and accumulation in the field of image and video processing, has rich experience in the application of depth learning in image and video scene, is familiar with tuning strategy and model tuning methods.
  5. good communication skills.
  6. priority in academic papers in the field of image and video.
  7. priority is achieved on authoritative data sets.
